typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> AllEmployees
AllEmployees split(equals(department,'1'),
	equals(department,'2'),
	equals(department,'3'),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitBasedOnDep@(ITEmployees, HREmployees, PayrollEmployees)
SplitBasedOnDep@ITEmployees sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ITemp.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ITempout
SplitBasedOnDep@HREmployees sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['HREmp.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> HREmpout
SplitBasedOnDep@PayrollEmployees sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['PayrollEmp.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PayrollOut
